website_summaries.verdict: A simple mix of peanuts, chocolate, and raisins.
pros: If you're looking for a classic trail mix, this is hard to beat with its low price and sweet-and-salty blend
The simple packaging is convenient and easy to bring along on the trail or in your lunch bag
cons: A few customers reported receiving nuts and raisins that were less than fresh

customer_reviews.title: There's a lot of peanuts. Feels like a bag of peanuts. Where are the almonds? and M&Ms?
customer_reviews.text: I like trail mix but this has a lot of peanuts. Honestly, it feels like I bought a bag of peanuts that had someone accidentally drop an Almond in there. Finding an almond is like winning a prize in a box of cereal. Don't even get me started on Raisins...
customer_reviews.author: HearMeOut

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened to my trailmix
customer_reviews.text: Package looked messed up... chocolate was actually melted which is hard to believe because they are m&ms
customer_reviews.author: Calvin & Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious -- but let's be honest, it's a dessert!
customer_reviews.text: Calling this trail mix healthy is like calling a trip to the dentist fun. That said, it tastes delicious, as it's mostly peanuts and chocolate, and who doesn't love that combo? Be sure to check the fat and calories if you're trying to buy a slimming snack, but if you just want something tat's a delicious treat, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: NashyN

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this as a snack and the freshness and taste was much better than some other brands of purchased trail mix that we tried.
customer_reviews.author: pamela ackerman

customer_reviews.title: taste old
customer_reviews.text: these were not fresh and did not taste like it. I actually gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: alicia garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be careful when I eat this because I live in the desert and we're already in triple digits, and the chocolate will melt. Still, when I can, I buy this treat to share, and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: 2 almonds in the whole bag...
customer_reviews.text: what a rip off i ordered 2 bags one had about 5-6 almonds and the second had 2 small almonds in the entire bag.
customer_reviews.author: shawn a

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Best trail mix I've had! Such a huge difference from the generic stuff you get from a grocery store. I mean... it's Planter's. The peanuts in this are 10x better than others and the mix of raisins and M&Ms is the perfect addition of sweetness and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: Very limited M & Ms and where are the almonds.
customer_reviews.text: Very limited M & Ms and where are the almonds? Lots of peanuts and raisins.......
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: mix that I like and something new for me to try
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mix was not fresh at all. It also has too much peanuts
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Peanuts!
customer_reviews.text: It contains a lot of peanuts for the price. It seems almost 70% unsalted peanuts. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Is it healthy, or is it candy? Does it matter?
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't eat trail mix, but I told the person I bought it for "Hey, I got the GOOD trail mix -- the one with the M&Ms". He was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Too many raisins
customer_reviews.text: Good, but too many raisins. I will still give it 4 stars though.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: The package is really small. I think it’s just too sweet for me. I will order a mix nuts without candies next time.
customer_reviews.author: Faina Butkow

customer_reviews.title: Not even half of it full.
customer_reviews.text: Not even half of it full maybe 1/4 of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon12345

customer_reviews.title: Raw peanuts
customer_reviews.text: They have a great mix but it was loaded with raw peanuts. There was hardly any almonds, raisins and m&m's. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It has chocoalate !
customer_reviews.text: I love this trail mix because it has M&M's in it! It taste really good.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t expired but it seemed old
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t expired but it seemed “old” there was a chalky residue in the inside of the bag and the m&ms were powdery. Still ate it though, so 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great munching stuff
customer_reviews.text: Super munchy. Love the balanced combination of salt and sweet
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How trailmix should be! Including real M&Ms, not some knock off chocolate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! But note that this is "personal" size -- ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! But note that this is "personal" size -- not the larger bags that seem to be only sold in packs of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Consuuumer

customer_reviews.title: AmazonFresh or Frozen?
customer_reviews.text: This item was placed in the same tote as my frozen items again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Addictive goodness...
customer_reviews.text: OMG... These are soooo good and addictive...I plan on buying the ingredients and make my own to save money... Until I do that however... These are so worth it... In not sure how good these are for me overall... But it's definitely good to my taste buds...
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Trail
customer_reviews.text: Nice and fresh. Almonds are my favorite and they are very good and the mix of everything is great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Great but mostly peanuts.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, mostly peanuts but I don’t have a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Yepiz

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I can't keep them. I have to hide them from myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Logan

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Snack
customer_reviews.text: I love this trail mix. I have eaten two bags already and got a third one just delivered. The first bag was light on almonds but the second was more even. The raisins are fresh and delicious. Peanuts and m&ms for the salty and sweet bite all together. Pure yum mines!! It’s the perfect snack to keep beside me while working.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snack
customer_reviews.text: Great snack! Excellent mixture and balance of sweet and salty!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey K

product_meta.title: Planters Nuts & Chocolate M&M's Trail Mix (6 oz Pouch)
product_meta.description: Planters Nuts and Chocolate Trail Mix combines the savory deliciousness of salty nuts with rich bursts of chocolate to create an irresistible snack. This sweet trail mix is made with real M&M'S milk chocolate candies along with roasted peanuts, roasted almonds and raisins to help you stay energized while letting you indulge your sweet tooth. This certified Kosher snack has 11 grams of fat per serving. Whether you're enjoying on your own, or sharing with family and friends, this trail mix with chocolate makes a great snack. Bring this snack-size 6 ounce bag of trail mix along on your next adventure, or pack it in your lunchbox to enjoy it with your meal. This Kosher trail mix contains 170 calories per serving to help it fit into any diet.
feature_bullets: One 6 oz. bag of Planters Nuts and Chocolate Trail Mix
Classic Planters sweet trail mix is great for enjoying a satisfying snack on-the-go
Help you stay energized while letting you indulge your sweet tooth
A great snack to enjoy yourself or to share
Help you stay energized while letting you indulge your sweet tooth

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
